document.full_text: forces loyal to laurent gbagbo, besieged in his abidjan residence, have retaken ground from rival presidential claimant alassane ouattara, the united nations said on friday.
document.title: u.n. says gbagbo striking back in abidjan
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to laurent gbagbo, besieged in his abidjan residence, have retaken ground from rival presidential claimant alassane ouattara, the united nations said on friday.
